results.content: Cut through bs taught me what I needed to know to experiment
results.content_html: Cut through bs taught me what I needed to know to experiment

results.content: Very detailed course and I appreciate it being driven towards beginners. Detailed explanations translated into a functional understanding. This wasn't a course of "copy what I do and you're done". Each element and function was broken down and explained how they work with each other.
results.content_html: Very detailed course and I appreciate it being driven towards beginners. Detailed explanations translated into a functional understanding. This wasn't a course of "copy what I do and you're done". Each element and function was broken down and explained how they work with each other.
